changeSet.author: denis
changeSet.comment: Migrate value from old parameter to the new one.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE study_parameter_value spv SET value = (SELECT value FROM study_parameter_value spv_2 WHERE parameter = 'allowCrfEvaluation' AND spv.study_id = spv_2.study_id) WHERE parameter = 'studyEvaluator';
